name: PartialThromboplastinTime
title: Partial Thromboplastin Time
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set includes coded for a Parial Thromboplastin Time lab test),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify partial thromboplastin time laboratory tests. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the "Laboratory Test" category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include LOINC codes that identify partial thromboplastin time.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
